name: Espurr
flavorText:
The organ that emits its intense psychic power is
sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.

previous.name: Furfrou
previous.flavorText:
Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes
it more elegant but also increases the
swiftness of its movements.
previous.formDescription: Forms only differ in appearance.  Furfrou's trim can be changed at any time in Friseur Furfrou in Lumiose City.  It reverts to its Natural Form after five days unless trimmed again, or if it is deposited in the PC.

next.name: Meowstic
next.flavorText:
When in danger, it raises its ears and
releases enough psychic power to
grind a 10-ton truck into dust.
next.formDescription: Male and female Meowstic have different level-up moves and hidden abilities.  While gender differences are not usually considered to be separate forms, Meowstic's are treated as such for practical purposes.

pokemon.name: Espurr
pokemon.flavorText:
The organ that emits its intense psychic power is
sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.
